inclusion.criterion: Between 30 and 70 years of age inclusive
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to give informed consent for participation after the nature of the study has been explained
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: In good health as determined by medical history, physical examination, clinical judgment of the investigator
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able (in the Investigators opinion) and willing to comply with all study requirements including be available for all the visits scheduled in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to allow his or her General Practitioner and consultant, if appropriate, to be notified of participation in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior receipt of a meningococcal vaccine
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior laboratory confirmed disease caused by N meningitides
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known or suspected autoimmune disease or impairment /alteration of immune function resulting from Receipt of immunostimulants
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Suspected or known HIV infection or HIV related disease
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine, which makes them ineligible for the study. However, they have ADAMTS13 >10%, which might be relevant for further evaluation.
